title: Technical leader
description:
Maintaining and development of Amundi middle office framework.

  • Support for developers
  • Migration of middle office framework to cloud architecture (docker container, AWS s3, spring-cloud)
  • Technical migration and refactoring of a legacy application
  • Maintaining middle office application.
  • Design and development of onboarding tools. (Angular and Spring-boot)
  • Securing Rest API with keycloack and Spring-security
  • Deploy Amex framework and flows to a new Amundi Client in cloud platform (Microsoft Azure)

title: Technical leader
description:
I contributed to the Employee Cockpit Project as a technical leader, then as scrum master.

The aim of the project is to automate customers requests management by scanning documents, saving them in an EDM, then creating a case managed by a BPM.

  • Design and development of a web application.
  • Choice of technologies and frameworks.
  • Managing and training junior developers.
  • Contributing to Continuous Integration of the project

title: Technical leader
description:
I contributed to some Generali projects in different business activities such as Treasury, training, reporting analysis...

  • Refactoring a legacy application.
  • Design and development of a web application.
  • Batch optimization and refactoring.
  • Writing functional and technical specification.

title: JEE Architect
description:
I worked in two projects for “Banque de France”. The first one is a data integration project and the second one is secured communication channel project.

I contributed within a team of three developers to these projects as JEE Architect.

  • Architecture choices proposal and validation.
  • Modeling and design applications.
  • Development industrialization.
  • Trainings for project team.
  • Technical survey.

title: Scrum master & JEE Architect
description:
Front office development for a digital banking trust solution.

This project provides a document management system for Banque Populaire Clients.

I contributed to the project as a Scrum Master and JEE Architect for a team of two junior developers and a web designer.

  • Facilitating the daily standup.
  • Helping the team maintain their burndown chart.
  • Setting up retrospectives, sprint reviews or sprint planning sessions.
  • Architecture choices proposal and validation.
  • Development industrialization.

title: Project manager assistant
description:
In this mission, I started as a senior developer for refactoring a Web application, Then I contributed as a project manager assistant for managing some projects maintenance and evolutions.

  • Team coaching and making sure that Scrum processes are adhered.
  • Managing applications deployment.
  • Refactoring a legacy web application.
  • Writing functional and technical specification.

title: JEE consultant
description:
I contributed to development of a back-end for a sales application as java/JEE consultant.

This project consists of implementing data integration solution for tobacconist sales terminals. The solution gathers all data in a server store sales data, manages stock and calls REST and SOAP web services of providers.

  • Architecture choices proposal and validation.
  • Design and development of the application.
  • Writing Unit and functional tests.

title: Technical leader
description:
In this mission, I worked on a department of “Compus France” that provide services for foreign student like transport, grant management and addressing scholarship-holders.

  • Development of new features for a web application managing student scholarship.
  • Refactoring and securing a web application.
  • Technical support for project teams.
  • Trainings for project teams.
  • Development industrialization.

title: JEE developper
description:
I contributed to a design and a development of a banking web application.

In this project, we used ATDD (Acceptance test–driven development) methodology.

  • Design and development of the application.
  • Writing Unit and functional tests.
  • Development industrialization.
  • Analysis and optimization of persistence layer.

title: Technical leader
description:
This mission consists of developing a web application for managing training and annual contributions of temporary work companies behalf the FAFTT.

  • Design and development of the application.
  • Writing Unit and functional tests.
  • Trainings for project team.
  • Data integration using an ETL.

title: JEE Developper
description:
• JEE developer (Struts, Hibernate, Spring, ACEGI, JasperReport, Eclipse, Tomcat).
  • Application integration with ETL (Kettle - Pentaho tool : http://www.pentaho.com)
  • Applications and Data Base designer (UML, BPM)
  • Deployment of Open Source application (GLPI : http://glpi-project.org)
